explanation: [0-0] A round, transparent glass bowl contains some melted chocolate sauce.

[0-3] Next, the scene switches, a hand appears and quickly dips a white balloon into the chocolate sauce in the bowl, submerging half of it. Then, the hand repeatedly dips the balloon into the chocolate sauce, coating more of its surface. The scene switches again, showing a wooden plate filled with many colorful candies. A hand pinches the top of the balloon and sticks the chocolate-covered side onto the candies. Then, the scene cuts to a gray background with the white subtitle "CHILL" in the center.

[0-3] Next, the scene switches, a hand appears and quickly dips a white balloon into the chocolate sauce in the bowl, submerging half of it. Then, the hand repeatedly dips the balloon into the chocolate sauce, coating more of its surface. The scene switches again, showing a wooden plate filled with many colorful candies. A hand pinches the top of the balloon and sticks the chocolate-covered side onto the candies. Then, the scene cuts to a gray background with the white subtitle "CHILL" in the center.

[0-3] Next, the scene switches, a hand appears and quickly dips a white balloon into the chocolate sauce in the bowl, submerging half of it. Then, the hand repeatedly dips the balloon into the chocolate sauce, coating more of its surface. The scene switches again, showing a wooden plate filled with many colorful candies. A hand pinches the top of the balloon and sticks the chocolate-covered side onto the candies. Then, the scene cuts to a gray background with the white subtitle "CHILL" in the center.

[3-10] The scene then shifts to the balloon, now covered in chocolate and candies, resting on a white tabletop. One hand holds the bottom of the balloon while the other holds a pair of metal scissors above it. The camera zooms in as the scissors puncture the balloon, causing it to deflate instantly. Next, the scene changes to a hand holding a transparent glass bowl containing a large, hollow chocolate ball covered with colorful candies. The scene then cuts to a plate of colorful ice cream topped with colorful sprinkles and small balls. An ice cream scoop then appears and scoops a portion from the plate. The scene transitions to show the hollow chocolate bowl filled with colorful ice cream balls. This is followed by a shot of the hollow chocolate bowl with ice cream balls and topped with colorful candies. Immediately after, a red candle is inserted into the top, followed by a green one. Finally, the camera zooms in on the green candle as it is being lit.
